name: FabRoll
description:
A game cooked in roughly 1.8 days.

BGM: sombre, green by Birocratic

  • birocratic.bandcamp.com/track/sombre-green

Every 9 seconds, you got a new hint. The game looks random at first, but something is hidden with the randomness...

Direction buttons to move.

Up (repeatedly) to escape gravity.

Mouse scroll to zoom in/out.

#peaceloveandjam

#2daygame

#ragefest

#jam4life

#microworldsjam
